headline: Is Kroger (KR) Priced Attractive After Recent Share Pullback And Mixed Valuation Signals
summary: If you are wondering whether Kroger's current share price lines up with its underlying value, this breakdown is designed to help you make sense of the numbers. The stock recently closed at US$59.51, with returns of 2.7% over the last year and 40.7% and 96.4% over the past 3 and 5 years, while the shorter term has been softer with a 5.5% decline over the last week and 2.8% decline over the last month. Recent attention on Kroger has centered on ongoing industry competition and how large...
